resources.string: Check your email and enter activation code
Please do not use this app while driving. Obey all driving laws! MyDrivingBlows will not be held liable for reckless driving while using this app.

Please keep your eyes on the road and obey applicable laws.

Do not use this app while in motion.

MyDrivingBlows will not be held liable for any accidents caused by unlawful use of this app.
Please do not use this app while driving. Obey all driving laws! MyDrivingBlows will not be held liable for reckless driving while using this app.

We collect information from you when you register on our site.

When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your: name, e-mail address, mailing address or phone number. You may, however, visit our site anonymously.

You can create own username, in order to hide your personal Facebook account.\n\nMyDrivingBlows respects all confidential information, and always keeps it in secret.
You can turn on GPS, to tag a location of taken photo.\n\nNote: Be sure, that geotagging is enabled in camera app.
Open \"Tag a Plate\" screen by default
